title: Framework temporarily pausing some laptop sales in the US due to tariffs
excerpt: Due to the new tariffs that came into effect on April 5th, weâ€™re temporarily pausing US sales of a few of our base Framework Laptop 13 systems (Ultra 5 125H and Ryzen 5 7640U). For now, these models will be removed from our US site. We will continue to provide updates as we have them.
